pkgmetadata.longdescription: Collinearity Detection using Redefined Variance Inflation Factor and Graphical Methods // The detection of troubling approximate collinearity in a multiple linear regression model is a classical problem in Econometrics. The objective of this package is to detect it using the variance inflation factor redefined and the scatterplot between the variance inflation factor and the coefficient of variation. For more details see Salmern R., Garca C.B. and Garca J. (2018) doi:10.1080/00949655.2018.1463376, Salmern, R., Rodrguez, A. and Garca C. (2020) doi:10.1007/s00180-019-00922-x, Salmern, R., Garca, C.B, Rodrguez, A. and Garca, C. "Limitations in Detecting Multicollinearity due to Scaling Issues in the mcvis Package" (2022, to appear in The R Journal) and Salmern, R., Garca, C.B, Garca J. (2023, working paper) arXiv:2005.02245.
